import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' function PlaceOrderScreen() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const navigate = useNavigate() const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) return (

Shipping

Shipping: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.postCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment method:

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items :

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? Your cart is empty :( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( ))} )}
) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
